title: Missiles and Drones Among Weapons Stolen From U.S. in Iraq and Syria
description:
Documents reveal “sensitive weapons and equipment” were taken – and the Pentagon may be unaware of the scope of the thefts.

The post Missiles and Drones Among Weapons Stolen From U.S. in Iraq and Syria appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Joe Biden Moves to Lift Nearly Every Restriction on Israel’s Access to U.S. Weapons Stockpile
description:
By easing virtually all limits on Israel's use of the stockpile, Biden could undercut U.S. military preparedness and congressional oversight.

The post Joe Biden Moves to Lift Nearly Every Restriction on Israel’s Access to U.S. Weapons Stockpile appeared first on The Intercept.
